title: Even more ripping yarns
brief_description: A compilation of three comic yarns starring Michael Palin. “Roger of the Raj” - A young man throws off the world of 18 course breakfasts and commits the most despicable act known to the British Army. Starring John Le Mesurier “Murder at Moorstones Manor” - A murder mystery that Agatha Christie never dared to write, everyone has a motive for the murders and they’re all intent on proving their own guilt. “Across the Andes by Frog” - The story of a pioneer and his frogs who set out to conquer the Andes. Starring Denholm Elliott.
